title: Preconfigured nodes for Systeme.io API requests
author: Solomon
readme:
Using the Systeme API can be challenging due to its pagination settings and low rate limit. This requires a bit more knowledge about API requests than a beginner might have.

This template provides preconfigured HTTP Request nodes to help you work more efficiently. Pagination settings, item limits, and rate limits are all configured for you, making it easier to get started.

### How to configure [Systeme.io](http://Systeme.io) credentials

The Systeme API uses the Header Auth method. So create a Header Auth credential in your n8n with the name "X-API-Key".

![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_ca9224a8bf.png)  
.

### Check out my other templates

👉 [**https://n8n.io/creators/solomon/**](https://n8n.io/creators/solomon/)
readme_zh:
由于Systeme API的分页设置和较低的速率限制，使用它可能颇具挑战性。这需要比初学者掌握的更多的API请求知识。

本模板提供了预配置的HTTP请求节点，以帮助您更高效地工作。分页设置、项目限制和速率限制均已为您配置妥当，让您更轻松地上手。

### 如何配置[Systeme.io](http://Systeme.io)凭证

Systeme API采用Header Auth认证方式。因此，请在您的n8n中创建一个名为"X-API-Key"的Header Auth凭证。

![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_ca9224a8bf.png)  
.
